title: No 'open in Chrome' option with search bar results
content:
Hi, 
When you used to perform a search using the search bar widget (not the Chrome widget) you used to have the option to 'Open in Chrome' either via a long press on a link or via the 3 dot menu in the top right. Neither of these now have this option. 
I used to use this all the time.
 How can I get this back? I don't really want to have 2 search bars on my home screen.
